conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clear isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry, clear floor separation, and professional cutaway execution.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is highly faithful; minor wall thickness differences in internal partitions compared to blueprint.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan accurately, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean white model rendering; high contrast and excellent visibility. Minor lack of material texturing.

detected_errors.description: Some window frame details show slight deviation from the exact plan markings but maintain the correct wall positions.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact layout, room proportions, and furniture arrangement of the original 2D plan.
